trans-unit.source: The Channels and conversions report in the Windows Dev Center dashboard lets you see how customers on Windows 10 have arrived at your app's listing.
trans-unit.target: The Channels and conversions report in the Windows Dev Center dashboard lets you see how customers on Windows 10 have arrived at your app's listing.

trans-unit.source: Channels and conversions report
trans-unit.target: Channels and conversions report

trans-unit.source: Channels and conversions report
trans-unit.target: Channels and conversions report

trans-unit.source: The **Channels and conversions** report in the Windows Dev Center dashboard lets you see how customers on Windows 10 have arrived at your app's listing.
trans-unit.target: The **Channels and conversions** report in the Windows Dev Center dashboard lets you see how customers on Windows 10 have arrived at your app's listing.

trans-unit.source: It lets you track [custom promotion campaigns](create-a-custom-app-promotion-campaign.md) for your app or its IAPs, and see how many of those visits resulted in new acquisitions.
trans-unit.target: It lets you track [custom promotion campaigns](create-a-custom-app-promotion-campaign.md) for your app or its IAPs, and see how many of those visits resulted in new acquisitions.

trans-unit.source: You can view this data in your dashboard, or [download the report](download-analytic-reports.md) to view offline.
trans-unit.target: You can view this data in your dashboard, or [download the report](download-analytic-reports.md) to view offline.

trans-unit.source: **Important** This report only shows page view and conversion data from customers on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: **Important** This report only shows page view and conversion data from customers on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: In this report, a *channel* refers to the method in which a customer arrived at your app's listing page (for example, browsing and searching in the Store, a link from an external website, a link from one of your custom campaigns, etc.).
trans-unit.target: In this report, a *channel* refers to the method in which a customer arrived at your app's listing page (for example, browsing and searching in the Store, a link from an external website, a link from one of your custom campaigns, etc.).

trans-unit.source: The following channel types are included:
trans-unit.target: The following channel types are included:

trans-unit.source: **Store traffic:** The customer was browsing or searching within the Store when they viewed your app's listing.
trans-unit.target: **Store traffic:** The customer was browsing or searching within the Store when they viewed your app's listing.

trans-unit.source: **External website:** The customer followed a link (without any custom campaign ID) to your app's listing from a website.
trans-unit.target: **External website:** The customer followed a link (without any custom campaign ID) to your app's listing from a website.

trans-unit.source: **Search engine:** The customer followed a link to your app's listing that was returned by an online search engine.
trans-unit.target: **Search engine:** The customer followed a link to your app's listing that was returned by an online search engine.

trans-unit.source: **Custom campaign:** The customer followed a link that used a [custom campaign ID](create-a-custom-app-promotion-campaign.md).
trans-unit.target: **Custom campaign:** The customer followed a link that used a [custom campaign ID](create-a-custom-app-promotion-campaign.md).

trans-unit.source: A *page view* means that a customer viewed your app's Store listing page, either via the web-based Store or from within the Store app on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: A *page view* means that a customer viewed your app's Store listing page, either via the web-based Store or from within the Store app on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: A *conversion* means that a customer has newly obtained a license to your app (whether you charged money or you've offered it for free) or to an IAP.
trans-unit.target: A *conversion* means that a customer has newly obtained a license to your app (whether you charged money or you've offered it for free) or to an IAP.

trans-unit.source: **Note** Conversion data is provided only for your custom campaigns.
trans-unit.target: **Note** Conversion data is provided only for your custom campaigns.

trans-unit.source: For other channel types, only page view data is currently included in this report.
trans-unit.target: For other channel types, only page view data is currently included in this report.

trans-unit.source: Apply filters
trans-unit.target: Apply filters

trans-unit.source: Near the top of the page, you can expand **Apply filters** to filter all of the data on this page by date range and/or by market.
trans-unit.target: Near the top of the page, you can expand **Apply filters** to filter all of the data on this page by date range and/or by market.

trans-unit.source: **Date**: The default filter is **Last 30 days**, but you can expand this up to **Last 12 months**.
trans-unit.target: **Date**: The default filter is **Last 30 days**, but you can expand this up to **Last 12 months**.

trans-unit.source: **Market**: The default setting is **All markets**.
trans-unit.target: **Market**: The default setting is **All markets**.

trans-unit.source: You can choose a specific market if you want this page to only show details from customers in that market.
trans-unit.target: You can choose a specific market if you want this page to only show details from customers in that market.

trans-unit.source: **Device type**: The default filter is **All devices**.
trans-unit.target: **Device type**: The default filter is **All devices**.

trans-unit.source: You can choose a specific device type if you want this page to only show data from customers using that type of device.
trans-unit.target: You can choose a specific device type if you want this page to only show data from customers using that type of device.

trans-unit.source: The info in all of the charts listed below will reflect the period of time selected in the **Apply filters** section, and will reflect any other filters you've chosen here.
trans-unit.target: The info in all of the charts listed below will reflect the period of time selected in the **Apply filters** section, and will reflect any other filters you've chosen here.

trans-unit.source: App page views and conversions by channel
trans-unit.target: App page views and conversions by channel

trans-unit.source: The **App page views and conversions by channel** chart shows how often your app's listing page was viewed and how customers arrived there.
trans-unit.target: The **App page views and conversions by channel** chart shows how often your app's listing page was viewed and how customers arrived there.

trans-unit.source: It also shows the number of conversions from custom campaigns over the selected period of time.
trans-unit.target: It also shows the number of conversions from custom campaigns over the selected period of time.

trans-unit.source: The **Page views** tab of this chart shows the number of times your app's listing page was viewed over the selected period of time.
trans-unit.target: The **Page views** tab of this chart shows the number of times your app's listing page was viewed over the selected period of time.

trans-unit.source: Views are grouped according to the type of channel by which the customer found your app's listing.
trans-unit.target: Views are grouped according to the type of channel by which the customer found your app's listing.

trans-unit.source: The **Conversions** tab of this chart shows the number of conversions (new acquisitions) over the selected period of time for customers who arrived at your app's listing via a custom campaign.
trans-unit.target: The **Conversions** tab of this chart shows the number of conversions (new acquisitions) over the selected period of time for customers who arrived at your app's listing via a custom campaign.

trans-unit.source: **Note** For info about all of your app's acquisitions, including those that did not occur via a custom campaign link and those from customers on other OS versions, see the [Acquisitions report](acquisitions-report.md).
trans-unit.target: **Note** For info about all of your app's acquisitions, including those that did not occur via a custom campaign link and those from customers on other OS versions, see the [Acquisitions report](acquisitions-report.md).

trans-unit.source: Campaign performance by channel
trans-unit.target: Campaign performance by channel

trans-unit.source: The **Campaign performance by channel** chart shows the number of page views for each channel type.
trans-unit.target: The **Campaign performance by channel** chart shows the number of page views for each channel type.

trans-unit.source: It also shows the total number of app and IAP conversions from your custom campaigns during the selected period of time.
trans-unit.target: It also shows the total number of app and IAP conversions from your custom campaigns during the selected period of time.

trans-unit.source: App page views and conversions by campaign ID
trans-unit.target: App page views and conversions by campaign ID

trans-unit.source: The **App page views and conversions by campaign ID** chart shows the number of page views and conversions for each of your specific [campaign IDs](create-a-custom-app-promotion-campaign.md) during the selected period of time.
trans-unit.target: The **App page views and conversions by campaign ID** chart shows the number of page views and conversions for each of your specific [campaign IDs](create-a-custom-app-promotion-campaign.md) during the selected period of time.

trans-unit.source: IAP conversions by campaign ID
trans-unit.target: IAP conversions by campaign ID

trans-unit.source: The **IAP conversions by campaign ID** chart shows the number of IAP conversions per custom campaign ID.
trans-unit.target: The **IAP conversions by campaign ID** chart shows the number of IAP conversions per custom campaign ID.

trans-unit.source: When an app install is counted as a conversion for a custom campaign, any IAP purchases in that app are also counted as conversions for the same custom campaign.
trans-unit.target: When an app install is counted as a conversion for a custom campaign, any IAP purchases in that app are also counted as conversions for the same custom campaign.

trans-unit.source: By default, the report includes any IAP which had a conversion that resulted from a link using a custom campaign ID during the selected period of time.
trans-unit.target: By default, the report includes any IAP which had a conversion that resulted from a link using a custom campaign ID during the selected period of time.

trans-unit.source: To view data for a specific IAP, select it from the **Section filters**.
trans-unit.target: To view data for a specific IAP, select it from the **Section filters**.

trans-unit.source: Conversions breakdown
trans-unit.target: Conversions breakdown

trans-unit.source: The **Conversions breakdown** chart shows more details about the page views that resulted from each of your channel types.
trans-unit.target: The **Conversions breakdown** chart shows more details about the page views that resulted from each of your channel types.

trans-unit.source: Click each channel type to get more info about conversions from that channel:
trans-unit.target: Click each channel type to get more info about conversions from that channel:

trans-unit.source: **Custom campaign:** Shows the specific campaign IDs.
trans-unit.target: **Custom campaign:** Shows the specific campaign IDs.

trans-unit.source: **External website:** Shows the domain of the website that linked to the app.
trans-unit.target: **External website:** Shows the domain of the website that linked to the app.

trans-unit.source: **Store traffic:** Shows whether the customer was using the Store client app or the online Store.
trans-unit.target: **Store traffic:** Shows whether the customer was using the Store client app or the online Store.

trans-unit.source: **Search engine:** Shows the specific search terms used by the customer.
trans-unit.target: **Search engine:** Shows the specific search terms used by the customer.

trans-unit.source: For custom campaigns, you can also see the number of app conversions and IAP conversions which resulted from each specific campaign ID.
trans-unit.target: For custom campaigns, you can also see the number of app conversions and IAP conversions which resulted from each specific campaign ID.
